column1: Kata Robata////On a bustling Friday night
column2: we put our names down and waited by the small bar until our table was ready. It was crowded with people vying to place drink orders and several more having sat at the bar for their sushi. This area could do with some embiggening
column3: especially if serving as a waiting room on busy nights. But we had a glass of wine from their rather paltry list
column4: which I didn't particularly care for
column5: but perhaps I should have been drinking sake.
